text: The Fugitive is a 1993 American action thriller movie based on the 1960s television series of the same name created by Roy Huggins. The movie was directed by Andrew Davis and stars Harrison Ford and Tommy Lee Jones, with supporting roles by Sela Ward, Joe Pantoliano, Andreas Katsulas, and Jeroen Krabb√©. The Fugitive premiered in the United States on August 6, 1993. It was nominated for seven Academy Awards including Best Picture; Jones won the Oscar for Best Supporting Actor. ==References== Category:1993 action movies Category:1993 thriller movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Andrew Davis Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: The Fugitive (1993 movie)
